name: Monthly Planner
description: Plan and track your month.A collection of digital and printables planners and reflection journals to help you get your month in order in Notion.How does it work?Plan the month ahead of you with the "Monthly Planner" printable template. Include a new formula, a small skill or a new challenge for the month.Decide if you want to use the digital version of Notion or print the "eBook".What's included?Monthly goalsSecondary goalsPrintable CalendarFrequently Asked QuestionsDoes it work with a free Noti
features: Monthly goals; Secondary goals; Printable Calendar; Absolutely. Just duplicate the theme from the link after your purchase.; It's very easy. Just open the template link and click "Duplicate" in the top right corner. If you are on mobile, click on the 3 dots menu to show the duplicate option.; No worries! Contact me in my DMs:Twitter
